visualValidator.title: Visual Validator
visualValidator.description: Enable AI-powered visual validation to ensure UI quality and catch layout issues.

researchPlanner.title: Research Planner
researchPlanner.description: Enable AI-powered research to investigate current best practices before complex tasks. Ensures modern approaches and up-to-date technology stacks.

codeGeneration.title: Code Generation Model
codeGeneration.description: Select the AI model for generating code.

secrets.valuePlaceholder: Enter API key or secret value
secrets.note: Secrets are stored securely in your browser's localStorage. AI models will have access to these secrets when needed for API calls and integrations.

integrations.name: Integration Name
integrations.apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter API key or access token
integrations.info: Integrations allow your AI agent to interact with external services like GitHub, Hugging Face, Gmail, and Google Drive. Enable/disable them as needed.

mcp.name: Server Name
advancedInfo: Priority: Higher values are tried first (0-100)
Fallback Order: If primary server fails, try servers in fallback order (0, 1, 2...)
Health Check: Click 'Test' to verify server connectivity
Load Balancing: Multiple servers with same priority are load-balanced

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface

aiCodeGeneration.title: AI Code Generation
aiCodeGeneration.description: Describe your app in natural language and Chimera generates full-stack code (React + FastAPI + MongoDB) with live preview.

designFirst.title: Design-First Workflow
designFirst.description: AI generates detailed design specifications before code. Visual validator ensures UI matches requirements perfectly.

browserAutomation.title: Browser Automation
browserAutomation.description: Natural language browser automation powered by AI. Just describe what you want - no coding or selectors needed.

documentVerification.title: Document Verification
documentVerification.description: Triple-model verification system (GPT-5 + Claude 4.5 + Gemini Vision) for detecting fraud and AI-generated content.

selfImprovement.title: Self-Improvement System
selfImprovement.description: AI analyzes and optimizes its own codebase. Auto-selects best models, finds bugs, and applies improvements.

aiEntryPoint.title: AI Entry Point
aiEntryPoint.description: Universal agent gateway with real-time execution logs and full control over AI operations.

toast.projectApprovedDesc: Your application is ready to use.
toast.validationCompleteDesc: UI passes all checks. Ready for your approval.

automation.title: Browser Automation
automation.goalPlaceholder: Describe what you want to automate...
